rest: a computer science graduate with a passion for programming.
I became obsessed with computers. Delving deeper and deeper in the realm of computers I found my passion.
in various programming languages. And despite being my most enjoyable hobby, software development is not my only passion, I even build my personal computer at the age of 16.

emphasis: What programming languages do I know?
rest: I use ASP.Net framework and ASP.Net Core on a daily basis at work and but I've also previously written programs in Java and Python as well as this website which uses React.
Currently I am looking for a job in Romania where I can hopefully move to.
I currently work at Softimpact, a web design development and e-marketing company that provides solutions to companies inside and outside the country.
At high school I excelled in Math and Physics, and currently hold a bachelor degree in computer science from the Arab Open University and from the Open University.

I speak:

    - English - Fluent (Learnt in middle school, high school, university, and I speak it daily)
    - French - Intermidiate (Learnt in middle school and high school)
    - Romanian - Beginner (Been learning for over a year using free online courses)
    - Arabic - Native

- Sex: Male
    - Birth year: 2001
